TopicTitle: Hello wonderful members of the ksp fourms!

Articles.Content: hi, I'm fosstar, I have been playing ksp since about 0.90, I love the game even though I still suck at a lot of it, mainly transferring into orbit of other planets, Jeb is now manning an unplanned lab in orbit around kerbol. i joined the forums to meet new ksp players and because i wanted to be part of the community, so i just wanted to say hi and get my time on the forums off to a good start! have a wonderful day!

Hello fosstar and welcome to the KSP Forums!

There is plenty of help to be had around here, especially in the Gameplay Questions section and the Tutorials subsection.  Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!
Thanks starhawk! my landings/crashings will be happy!

Welcome aboard Fosstar! Enjoy yourself around here and have fun! 

May your rockets fly safe and true with the occasional explosion!

~Lo

Welcome Fosstar! Nice to meet you. Keep at it, it took me many tries before I learned to nail interplanetary transfers.

One thing I learned that might help is switching focus to the destination planet to fine tune your transfer after you've set up an intercept.

Happy flying!
